scripts.compile: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile
scripts.deploy:all:localhost: npm run deploy:verifiers:localhost && npm run deploy:registry:localhost && npm run deploy:hub:localhost
scripts.deploy:hub:localhost: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployHub.ts --network localhost --verify
scripts.deploy:registry:localhost: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployRegistry.ts --network localhost --verify
scripts.deploy:verifiers:localhost: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifiers.ts --network localhost --verify
scripts.deploy:verifyall:localhost: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifyAll.ts --network localhost --verify
scripts.deploy:all:sepolia: npm run deploy:verifiers:sepolia && npm run deploy:registry:sepolia && npm run deploy:hub:sepolia
scripts.deploy:hub:sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployHub.ts --network sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:registry:sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployRegistry.ts --network sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:verifiers:sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifiers.ts --network sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:verifyall:sepolia: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifyAll.ts --network sepolia --verify
scripts.deploy:all:celo: npm run deploy:verifiers:celo && npm run deploy:registry:celo && npm run deploy:hub:celo
scripts.deploy:hub:celo: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployHub.ts --network celo --verify
scripts.deploy:registry:celo: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployRegistry.ts --network celo --verify
scripts.deploy:verifiers:celo: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifiers.ts --network celo --verify
scripts.deploy:verifyall:celo: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployVerifyAll.ts --network celo --verify
scripts.deploy_all: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Deploy_All.ts --network optimism --verify
scripts.test:sdkcore:local: TEST_ENV=local npx hardhat test test/sdk/sdkCore.test.ts --network localhost
scripts.deploy:pcr0:celo: npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/deployPCR0.ts --network celo --verify
scripts.update:pcr0:celo: PCR0_ACTION=add PCR0_KEY=123 npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/scripts/updatePCR0.ts --network celo --reset
